description: Gaussian binomial coefficient [ n,12 ] for q=-5.
references: J. Goldman and G.-C. Rota, The number of subspaces of a vector space, pp. 75-83 of W. T. Tutte, editor, Recent Progress in Combinatorics. Academic Press, NY, 1969.
I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration. Wiley, NY, 1983, p, 99.
M. Sved, Gaussians and binomials, Ars. Combinatoria, 17A (1984), 325-351.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 12..130
mathematica: QBinomial[Range[12,20],12,-5] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 28 2012 *)Table[QBinomial[n, 12, -5], {n, 12, 20}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 06 2012 *)
prog: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,12,-5) for n in xrange(12,18)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 28 2009](MAGMA) r:=12; q:=-5; [&*[(1-q^(n-i+1))/(1-q^i): i in [1..r]]: n in [r..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 06 2012
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
extensions: More terms from Harvey P. Dale, Mar 28 2012
